article: It's a Sunday morning. Jack and his father  _  on a big bus. There are  many  people on it. Some of  _  come from America and some  are from  England and Canada. They are all friends. They are going to the Summer Palace . There are two  _  on the bus. One is a man. He is the driver. He  is driving  the bus.  Another  is a young woman. She  _  good English. She is talking about the Summer Palace. All the passengers are listening 44  _  Her. They like the Summer Palace. They want  to see  it very much.
